original_text: In every province and in every city to which the edict of the king came, there was joy and gladness among the Jews, with feasting and celebrating. And many people of other nationalities became Jews because fear of the Jews had seized them.
korean_text: 왕의 어명이 이르는 각 지방, 각 읍에서 유다인들이 즐기고 기뻐하여 잔치를 베풀고 그 날을 명절로 삼으니 본토 백성이 유다인을 두려워하여 유다인 되는 자가 많더라

sentences.original_text: to which the edict of the king came
there was joy and gladness among the Jews
And many people of other nationalities

sentences.korean_translation: 유대인에 대한 두려움이 그들을 사로잡았기 때문입니다
